snippet: A constellation of armed groups battling to advance their own agendas is effectively creating the outlines of separate fiefs.
abstract: Syria, after more than two years of conflict, is breaking up; constellation of armed groups battling to advance their own agendas are effectively creating outlines of separate armed fiefs; as war expands in scope and brutality, its biggest casualty appears to be integrity of the Syrian state.

byline.contributor: Anne Barnard and Hwaida Saad contributed reporting from Beirut, Lebanon, and Michael D. Shear from Washington.

lead_paragraph: A constellation of armed groups battling to advance their own agendas is effectively creating the outlines of separate fiefs.

headline.seo: Pressure of War Is Causing Syria to Break Apart
headline.main: Syria Begins to Break Apart Under Pressure From War
headline.print_headline: War's Pressure is Causing Syria to Break Apart

keywords.value: Middle East and North Africa Unrest (2010- )
